meanings.definition: A type of solitaire card game.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy playing Canfields during my free time.
meanings.sent2: Canfields is a popular card game among my friends.
meanings.sent3: When I'm bored, I challenge myself to beat Canfields in under five minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in Canfields are like a well-shuffled deck, always in order.
meanings.sent5: The rules of Canfields can be tricky, but once you understand, it's fun to play.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Canfields is our new neighbor down the street.
meanings.sent2: The Canfields family has lived in this town for generations.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the Canfields have a family crest with a deck of cards on it.
meanings.sent4: The Canfields are as unique as their surname, standing out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: When you hear the name Canfields, you immediately think of a close-knit family.
